entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
